Author: MrDrowner
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: After reading the whitepaper, a couple of questions has been raised:  1) Why smart contracts are so needed to make the games fair and transparent, while standard simple approach exists already for years,  using hash of server+ client seeds, see for example  https://thebitcoinstrip.com/a-guide-to-provable-fairness-in-online-casinos/  Or for crash games even more simple method with one initial seed and sequence of its hashs of hashs etc. used for the rolls and published in reverse order (e.g. bustabit.com).  Because everyone knows 2 big obvious disadvantages of smart contracts: time and  ether gas consumption ?  2) Why truegame.io plans as high house edge as 14% !!! (see whitepaper) while the most of modern provable fair casinos has no more than 1% (see mentioned bustabit.com and dozens of others) ?  Why the players should choose truegame.io despite these 2 grand disadvantages ?  Keeping the jackpot on the contract makes sense at first glance, but, as was reasonable stated in the white paper, it's better to store the large amounts in cold hardware wallets, so we fall back to dependence from owners.

Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: iGaming is a very competitive industry with lot of players in the market. Nevertheless, in our team there are real sharks of this industry who have repeatedly launched large and successful projects in this field. They know everything about how to attract and retain players. Also, there is another feature in the industry - if the player trusts the casino, then he sticks to this platform and spends all his time there, as in order to switch to another platform, he first needs to overcome the barrier of mistrust. We offer a full openness and transparency to the players, so the trust towards our platform is higher than to most traditional casinos. Only a few companies have tried to make smart contract based games of chances, and no one has succeeded on such a scale as we have: only we realized instant wins, scratch cards, prize draws and integrated it into a universal blockchain platform. We thoroughly studied the sphere of iGaming, therefore before the start of the ICO, last year we tested it on long-time players and received a great feedback, and on its basis we develop our product further. So, in the context of the given question, we would also like to note the following undeniable advantages of Truegame: 1) Successful use of smart contract technology (apart from blockchain) 2) Totally unique content 3) White label solutions for other market participants 4) And many more (all the advantages you can find on our website).

Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: We can get listed there when we gain certain volumes of trading ($100k per month).  Quote from: Fett11 on July 04, 2018, 12:35:06 AM Good news! What about other exchanges? Are you going to enter some from the top?  Today, the realities of the market are such that larger exchanges require the presence of a certain trading volume on smaller exchanges. Hence, our strategy for listing the token is to approach crypto exchanges from the small and medium to large scale ones. We plan to list our token on several small and medium-scale exchanges, and after that we will try to get to large exchanges.  We are working to make TGAME available on big-scale exchanges as soon as possible but for this we need to consistently and successfully pass the listings on the small and medium-sized exchanges.

Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: So far we have enough opportunities of Ethereum but we don't exclude own blockchain in the future. Airdrop is not planned. Thank you for your feedback!  Quote from: Razhabov on April 10, 2018, 10:36:26 PM What is the proportion of tokens that are being given to team members?  A total of 300,000,000 TGAME tokens will be issued and they will be distributed as follows: Advisors 4.0% Team 15.0% Bounty 1.0% Reserve 10.0% Crowdsale 70.0%  Quote from: blink20 on April 11, 2018, 01:14:17 AM is there any chance that in the future the games wont be only a game of chance ? Like poker, blackjack and so on?  Many new games will be launched in the near future: Gift Box, Blockchain ball lottery, Crypto millions lottery (MAY 2018); Smart Roulette, Slot games,  Rock paper scissors,  Instant Lotto Duel (JUNE 2018); Craps, Bingo lotto, Keno lotto (JULY 2018); Poker Room (AUGUST 2018); Betting (SEPTEMBER 2018); Pontoon, Baccarat (OCTOBER 2018); Wheel of fortune, Crystal Ball, Pinball, Crypto diamonds, Coin flip (NOVEMBER 2018).  Quote from: Yorikis on April 12, 2018, 07:00:38 AM You have a very wide coverage of countries. But I don't see the United States on that list, is that due to legal difficulties?  Yes, US players are not accepted yet.  Quote from: T85083598 on April 12, 2018, 02:59:38 PM Are we sure that the average online player is aware of the benefits related to blockchain being unhackable?  We cover this issue in detail on our website. And we will work to ensure that the benefits of blockchain were even more understandable to our users.

Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: You can participate in our ICO using the following currencies: ETH, BTC, LTC  Quote from: PRAKT!K on April 12, 2018, 07:58:51 PM But many people who are interested in gambling have nothing to do with crypto world, why there is no opportunity to invest with fiat?  According to the rules of our Token sale we can't accept Fiat.  Quote from: GolD ApPlE on April 12, 2018, 08:51:46 PM can i invest in this project if gambling is prohibited in my country? or are these thing not connected int anyway? You know if feel like sponsoring an illegal activity  Only US citizens can not participate in our ICO. If you have doubts, we recommend you to consult a lawyer.  Quote from: Fett11 on April 12, 2018, 10:47:44 PM Yeah, the pportunity to get all the amount of jackpot by 1 player is extremely low but it still is higher than 0, so that's just the risk you take?  This risk is relevant for any gambling site.  Quote from: ivangoff on April 12, 2018, 11:25:21 PM Thank you for such great job, devs! But why not to develop maybe your own gambling game? The one no one have introduced before?  We're working on it. By the way, you can see our game "Prizes". No one has done this before on the blockchain, as far as we know.  Quote from: strelok25 on April 12, 2018, 11:39:08 PM Good that you already have a working platform for games, tell me how long has your project worked on the games market? Than the you platform games is better from other decentralized platform games? How do you plan to attract many users to your gaming platform?  iGaming is a very competitive industry with lot of players in the market. Nevertheless, in our team there are real sharks of this industry who have repeatedly launched large and successful projects in this field. They know everything about how to attract and retain players. Also, there is another feature in the industry - if the player trusts the casino, then he sticks to this platform and spends all his time there, as in order to switch to another platform, he first needs to overcome the barrier of mistrust. We offer a full openness and transparency to the players, so the trust towards our platform is higher than to most traditional casinos. Only a few companies have tried to make smart contract based games of chances, and no one has succeeded on such a scale as we have: only we realized instant wins, scratch cards, prize draws and integrated it into a universal blockchain platform. We thoroughly studied the sphere of iGaming, therefore before the start of the ICO, last year we tested it on long-time players and received a great feedback, and on its basis we develop our product further. So, in the context of the given question, we would also like to note the following undeniable advantages of Truegame: 1) Successful use of smart contract technology (apart from blockchain) 2) Totally unique content 3) White label solutions for other market participants 4) And many more (all the advantages you can find on our website).  Quote from: hoanghai on April 13, 2018, 07:13:22 PM What is the minimum ETH I can use to buy into your program ? if hard cap is not reached, will you announce how many coins will be burned after ico  At the moment, there are Main sales stage with the price of 1 ETH = 9,250 TGAME. The minimum investment is 0.1 ETH. All information about the amount of sold tokens and collected funds is constantly exposed on our website.

How are you gonna to compete with others? What is your advantage over them, which will allow you to attract more customers?   Our main differences to other players on the market are:  1) We have developed a fully implemented smart contract based iGaming platform that was launched last year where the users are already playing more than a dozens of games.  2) We have a strong Advisory board that are all from the industry of iGaming which has a total common experience in the gambling industry of more than 50 years.  3) We were the first ones in the industry to launch instant games on smart contracts. Honestly, I liked your site, but the way how you are doing promotions is wrong.  1. You can easily unsubscribe from our newsletter. 2. According to our roadmap, in the near future our platform will release almost every popular type of gambling game, running on blockchain smart contracts. In connection with all of the above, we have no reason to doubt our methods of promotion.

Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: The TGAME Token will be listed within a few weeks after the end of the ICO on several exchanges. We negotiate with many exchanges from the top 50. The top 50 includes such exchanges as Kucoin and YoBit, cex.io and others. We have an expert on our team who successfully works for the Revain token listing on crypto exchanges.  Quote from: PISTON_1 on April 09, 2018, 08:32:15 AM  I hope to see them on coinmarket cap one day too. Dev, have you already any agreed listings btw? Not just keeping in contact.. And which one is it?   Truegame does not disclose coin listing information until an official announcement has been made due to the policies of the exchanges. For example, Binance, according to its official policy, does not disclose coin listing information until an official announcement has been made. Additionally, if a project has announced listing on Binance prior to an official Binance announcement, they are at risk of disqualification.  Quote from: Tiamel on April 09, 2018, 10:58:26 AM Do you have any successful gambling businesses before? Itâ€™s important in terms of popularity. If you had one, than you already have an audience, that might be loyal to you   iGaming is a very competitive industry with a lot of players in the market. Nevertheless, in our team there are real sharks of this industry who have repeatedly launched large and successful projects in this field. They know everything about how to attract and retain players. Also, there is another feature in the industry - if the player trusts the casino, then he sticks to this platform and spends all his time there, as in order to switch to another platform, he first needs to overcome the barrier of mistrust. We offer a full openness and transparency to the players, so the trust towards our platform is higher than to most traditional casinos.  Quote from: Zast on April 09, 2018, 02:21:37 PM Are you developing your platform on the Ethereum code? Or another one? There are other options nowadays   At the moment, the core of our system is Ethereum based DAPP developed by us. Ethereum meets our requirements and allows us to provide both a successful user experience for the player and an income for the platform. At the same time, the Ethereum network is not sufficiently optimal, so our specialists are constantly studying new technologies that would improve the game process and reduce transaction costs. Our platform allows to quickly transfer the entire architecture to new blockchain, whereas the user interface stays almost unchanging. For example, at the moment Cardano blockchain looks like one of the promising technologies to us.   Quote from: mandarinka on April 09, 2018, 06:31:16 PM do you have this article in english? wanna read it, looks interesting https://twitter.com/truegameSRL/status/983323312561500160  Unfortunately, we are not the authors of this article.

Truegame does not disclose coin listing information until an official announcement has been made due to the policies of the exchanges. For example, Binance, according to its official policy, does not disclose coin listing information until an official announcement has been made. Additionally, if a project has announced listing on Binance prior to an official Binance announcement, they are at risk of disqualification.  Quote from: Fanat74 on April 06, 2018, 06:54:49 PM What is your target audience? with what companies are you going to cooperate for promoting?  1. We target three different type of customers: 1) Middle-aged men and women with middle and high income that visit casinos out of curiosity and to try their luck and skills using different strategies in practice. 2) Middle-aged men and women with low-income visiting gambling portals in order to win and improve their financial conditions. 3) Young men and women with different income levels considering casino as a source of entertainment and opportunity to pass the time with fun.  2. At the moment, we are negotiating with several companies and we are in the process of choosing.  Quote from: tukanglas on April 10, 2018, 02:56:19 AM good project, what is the price of tokens?  At the moment there is the Pre-Sale Stage 3 with is 20% to a price on Main Sale, 1 ETH = 11,100 TGAME (bonus included)  Quote from: Zast on April 10, 2018, 03:04:17 AM Many projects add more and more crypto on which investors could buy their tokens. Quote from: HuP9RX on April 04, 2018, 02:56:07 PM I don't quite understand,35% of funds are for jackpot, so what if someone hits jackpot just after ICO?  The amount of winning is determined by probability. For example, it's necessary to guess 6 digits out of 49 to get a jackpot in a lottery. Therefore, the opportunity to get all the amount of jackpot by 1 player is extremely low. In most of the scenarios, small parts of the jackpot are distributed among winners.  Quote from: Logan22 on April 04, 2018, 02:59:42 PM project is strong, but it shouldn't be only for crypto community, blockchain-based platform is good, but the biggest part of gambling community will prefer fiat  We have already developed a solution that automatically converts other currencies and Fiat into our tokens, which are then used in games. Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: Blockchain technology implementation can change the industry dramatically, mainly through delivering a new level of transparency to the online gaming. Nowadays many of new and existing casino organizations are concentrating their efforts on smart contract gambling. However, no one has succeeded on such a scale as we have: only we realized instant wins, scratch cards, prize draws and integrated it into a universal blockchain platform.  Quote from: anchousser on April 05, 2018, 09:05:24 AM I like your business model so badly!Smart contracts are nice, but actually do not guarantee anything. Really like your scratching games Smiley Good luck!  The great strength and attraction of our project is that by using a blockchain and smart contracts logic we make games, lotteries, and prize draws completely transparent for the players. The results of each game are verifiable in the blockchain open registry. The winnings are distributed by the blockchain automatically, without the casino manager being involved.  Quote from: AGRE$$IV on April 05, 2018, 09:35:19 AM They also introduced ability to deposit money in any way you like, including a number of coins and fiat money as well.The only one thing I don't understand how many poeple are going to be real users of the truegame platform after the launch. That's unpredictable, but interesting.   We started with a focus group of several hundred players last year. Users play on the platform every day. Recent info about the games played and winnings won can be verified on the public blockchain. The number of players is constantly growing. Also we will launch a campaign to attract more players to the platform.  Quote from: Casperok on April 05, 2018, 04:18:36 PM truegame take a very strategic position that is very likely big, and able to steal the attention of investors.good project, it deserves a lot of attention, i will wait for the bounty programm!  Information about our bounty campaign you can find here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2990314  Quote from: EfIRchEk on April 06, 2018, 03:36:46 PM No denying the platform can be a success, although I think u should add some really unique features which will distinguish from other platforms  Unique content is one of the key factors for the success of online casinos, since most of them look the same and diff er only in color. We have done a lot of work to develop our own architecture, unique content and design, make it adaptive for most of mobile devices. We do not use White Label solutions of others, instead, we created a strong solutions development department of our own.

We are already obtaining gaming licenses in two different jurisdictions (Malta and CuraÃ§ao). The licensing authorities have approved the project, and now weâ€™re completing the final formalities. Body: You can find out this information in our WP, pages 17-20  Quote from: KaDeGrOB(1) on March 29, 2018, 03:28:11 PM one of the blockchain advantages is anonymity, but will I have to have an account in this platfrom to play or can it be done only through smart contracts?  In the near future, we will provide the opportunity to play our games directly through smart contracts bypassing the website. See our WP for more information.  Quote from: Ceburekus on March 29, 2018, 05:30:37 PM Don't quite get it, which crypto currencies will be integrated?  At the moment the payout is available in following currencies: LTC/ BTC/ ETH. We have developed a solution that automatically converts other currencies and Fiat into our tokens, which are then used in games. In the near future this solution will be launched and available to players.  Quote from: Noriman on March 29, 2018, 07:48:24 PM Weaknesses: 1. Not quite clear whether american guys may participate and even play games legally after ICO 2. A number of competitors (TG has lots of comparative advantages though)  These problems are not a big deal, however, would be nice to make the situation aronud US clear  1. We will receive several licenses and expand the list of eligible countries in the near future. 2. Only a few companies have tried to make smart contract based games of chances, and no one has succeeded on such a scale as we have: only we realized instant wins, scratchcards, prize draws and integrated it into a universal blockchain platform. We thoroughly studied the sphere of iGaming, therefore before the start of the ICO, last year we tested it on long-time players and received a great feedback, and on its basis we develop our product further.  Quote from: Aberrant on March 29, 2018, 08:21:10 PM the main factor influencing price of your token is the number of users on the platform, so how you going to expand to the necessary level?  IGaming is a very competitive industry with lot of players in the market. Nevertheless, in our team there are real sharks of this industry who have repeatedly launched large and successful projects in this field. They know everything about how to attract and retain players. Also, there is another feature in the industry - if the player trusts the casino, then he sticks to this platform and spends all his time there, as in order to switch to another platform, he first needs to overcome the barrier of mistrust. We offer a full openness and transparency to the players, so the trust towards our platform is higher than to most traditional casinos.

Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: We understand the importance of ensuring a full transparency, so that any player can be aware of the reliability and honesty of our algorithms. Therefore, we place the code of all smart contracts on Github. See here, please https://github.com/truegame  Quote from: EnterTheLight on March 27, 2018, 10:43:19 PM So dear truegame team! Tell me please. Do US citizens could play your games after the crowdsale? When your platfrom fully works. It is a big deal.  We will receive several licenses and expand the list of eligible countries in the near future.  Quote from: Tiamel on March 28, 2018, 11:22:52 AM Well gambling was always popular but still how can you state it will stay popular and especially why this platform will be popular?  The presence of experienced specialists in the team will allow us to implement an effective multi-channel marketing campaign to attract players with a low lead cost. When implementing the strategy, we will rely on the experience of team members and their competence in performance and email marketing, as well as leads generation for gambling projects. More about our marketing strategy you can find in the WP (page 28)  Quote from: Suarezzz on March 28, 2018, 01:12:42 PM Yeah, this project is already well known among the community but how are going to attract even more people?  We are constantly working on expanding our presence in different kinds of media and via partnerships. For example, in the coming days we will participate in two industrial conferences. Also, we posted articles in such a big scale media as Bitcoin.com, The Merkle, CCN and other resources, Cointelegraph is on the way. Plus, we've added a lot of local resources (Asia, Latam) to be present in the countries locally. We are also negotiating with several youtubers. And many, many more. Not to mention that we are present in the most well-known ICO trackers.  Quote from: CeNaToP on March 29, 2018, 05:19:50 PM I worry about security issues, are you planning to test your patform's vunerability  We are very attentive to the security of our platform. Our infrastructure in its core is focused on the security of all interacting parties. Smart contracts and billing management in the environment of blockchain provide security to both the player and our platform. Nevertheless, we find it extremely important to have external security audit done by independent specialists and we contribute to this in every way. More information about the measures that we plan to take you can learn in our WP (page 24)

Author: truegame.io
Title: âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸âœ…âœ”ï¸[ANN][ICO] TRUEGAME - trusted iGaming platform based on smart contracts
Body: We plan to implement sports betting and bets on esport. Our advisory board has CEO of Esports.com. Probably, we will launch a joint solution together. You can find it in our roadmap in September 2018: https://ico.truegame.io/docs/roadmap.pdf  Quote from: ZuLLA141 on March 26, 2018, 09:15:41 PM Obviously good solution for trying to get advantage against non-crypto gambling websites like online casinos which are always being banned. Are you sure that TG will have such rights to function on the internet legally? I think there could be a problem  Truegame operates strictly in accordance with the legal requirements. If some country restricts gambling, we will not violate the laws of this country. In those countries where games with the use of cryptocurrencies are not considered as gambling, we will accept only cryptocurrencies. And we'll accept fiat only in those countries that allow it. We will not violate a law of any country that forbids gambling. This is our rule.  Quote from: Deform on March 26, 2018, 09:23:27 PM Everyone says this project already collected big postive feedback, but what are the facts?  We'd like to highlight the following points as the most important: - Fully implemented platform with players - A team of professionals and strong Advisory board with vast expertise in the industry - Innovative technology of games based on smart contracts - Fully integrated platform that allows us to quickly implement new games on smart contract, add payment systems, third-party services, etc. - Gaming licenses of two jurisdiction are to be obtained soon  Quote from: youngmarnou on March 27, 2018, 10:08:47 AM Will you be having an airdrop and do you have a bounty program running? I will get whitelisted for the time being  There is no airdrop program. Information about our bounty campaign you can find here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2990314

Only a few companies have tried to make smart contract based games of chances, and no one has succeeded on such a scale as we have: only we realized instant wins, scratchcards, prize draws and integrated it into a universal blockchain platform. We thoroughly studied the sphere of iGaming, therefore before the start of the ICO, last year we tested it on long-time players and received a great feedback, and on its basis we develop our product further. So we would also like to note the following undeniable advantages of Truegame: 1) Successful use of smart contract technology (apart from blockchain) 2) Totally unique content 3) White label solutions for other market participants 4) And many more (all the advantages you can find on our website).  Quote from: thiendaicat on March 26, 2018, 06:11:46 AM I'm a gamer, This is a very interesting project. Do you complete your web platform or any MVP product so I and other could take a deep look about it? Do you mind negotiate any contracts with other companies that refer to crypto sphere? Some lending platforms, advertisers or even developers (I think you are the developers though). This could be reasonable to expand your project  We are planning several interesting partnerships with companies from the cryptosphere. Watch out for updates  Quote from: EnterTheLight on March 17, 2018, 12:39:02 AM Oh you accept LTC, what about Dash? Or even PayPal? You have so many versions of your website in terms of languages, are you going to add also some more ways to deposit money? Could you answer me please. I have an interesting question. For example you are successful in the sale period, but all the guys are nor interesting in gambling at all, only in bounties and speculating the token. So you have 0 to 10 users daily playing your games. So it's not enough to cover even hosting costs for you website. What is likely to happen to the token? Of course it seems like a fairytale, however, you indeed may have very small amount of users. What to do then? (I'm not interested in knowing your strategy like 'we do increase advertising' or smth). I just want to make it clear about what I should expect as a token holder.  - We will accept all popular crypto currencies to provide maximum convenience to the user. - We don't consider the situation that we'll have few players. We know how to attract players, and we will do it professionally.  Quote from: Jokerrr on March 18, 2018, 05:20:37 PM Well, what happens if crypto continues falling? Does this mean anything for your project?  Cryptocurrency is very volatile, no project is immune from this. But we calculated our business model in such a way as to be able to confidently develop even in the conditions of such volatility in the ico process.  Quote from: Titomonriki on March 20, 2018, 03:09:08 AM Hm, payment speed is immediate, well, how could it be the truth if blockchain does not allow to do that?? Body: In comparison to our competitors Truegame has the following advantages: -   A full smart contract transparency -   All available methods of balance deposit -   Commissions are low and included into house edge -   Jackpot provision and winning payment are guaranteed by smart contract -   Payment speed is immediate  We differ from traditional gambling platforms in that we give the player the opportunity to check the fairness of the drawing. There are many differences, but I'd like to especially highlight the level of implementation of the project (fully working platform) and unique game content. Hence, if you are not ready to undergo a KYC procedure, we do not recommend buying our tokens. Body: Truegame Platform Drops New iGaming Technologies  Truegame is responsible for integrating these new technologies into iGaming and furthering their development to come up with a solution to unfair gaming practices by combining the thinking behind iGaming and the potential for provably fair gaming, made possible by blockchain technology. Individuals can also take part in traditional betting practices, such as scratch cards, lotteries dice and other games of chance, which can all be integrated with smart contracts.  The True-game platform was initiated in 2016 and now offers its users over a dozen different titles. In addition to games, there are other prize draws, gift boxes, dice, scratchcards, lotteries and more added to the collection. Truegame is a fully working smart contract-based iGaming project, with individual scalable architecture.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/truegame-platform-drops-new-igaming-technologies/

Body: Hey devs, (maybe stupid) question ahead!  The price of one token is fixed in ethereum, while the hardcap is mentioned in USD(T) -- this confuses me somehow. If we would assume that ethereum will drop to 25% of its actual value (what it won't, just to make my point clear) you could sell 100% of your tokens and still you would not have reached your hardcap.  Of course, it will not happen this way, but nevertheless, depending on the market in the next weeks, it could be possible that  a) all tokens (the mentionend 70%) are sold clearly before hardcap is reached  b) hardcap is already reached with 50% of the tokens being sold  --> the numbers are of course just random and mathematically not correct, but I think you get my point.  How will you handle this?  By the way - very cool project
